body_html: No need to create variable manually, sorry for the misunderstanding! The variable reuse mechanism had a bug in 1.0.1 which ignored reuse checking: you shouldn't set "reuse=True" if the variable hasn't been created before. Just set "reuse=None", I hope that works. I'm closing for now, please reopen if it doesn't work for you, we'll help. Sorry for the problem!

body: No need to create variable manually, sorry for the misunderstanding! The variable reuse mechanism had a bug in 1.0.1 which ignored reuse checking: you shouldn't set "reuse=True" if the variable hasn't been created before. Just set "reuse=None", I hope that works. I'm closing for now, please reopen if it doesn't work for you, we'll help. Sorry for the problem!
